data.name: RPGScenery - Stone Desert Scene
data.detailed_description:
The barren wasteland of the stone desert is mostly filled with pebble-sized stones, broken here and there by various rocks, even the size of a building. The air is dry, and there is no trace of rain or water. Magical whirlwinds sweep between the rocks, twisting dozens of pebbles and stones with them, bringing certain death to those foolhardly enough to venture near them.

This DLC contains 4 battlemaps to help you to bring your TTRPG session to the next level
